article.title: Northrop to Support Aircraft Infrared Countermeasures
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Rolling Meadows, Ill., is being awarded a $159,955,980 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure hardware and support for the Large Aircraft Infrared Countermeasures System. Contract involves Foreign Military Sales. The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio.
